text: Ezɨ bar mɨzaraghara, me dɨkavigha Tekoan nguibar ekiamɨn boroghɨn itir gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn mangasava amua iti. Me tɨghar Jerusalem ataghɨraghamin dughiamɨn, Atrivim Jehosafat kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia Judaba ko Jerusalemia, ia oragh! Ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian Godɨn ikɨ, egh tuivigh gavgafigh. Egh ia Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akaba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim dar ikɨ, egh ia uan apaniba abɨragham.”
